title: CSAF aggregator
description: Representation of information where to find CSAF providers as a JSON document.

metadata_t.title: CSAF issuing party metadata.
metadata_t.description: Contains the metadata of a single CSAF issuing party.

last_updated.title: Last updated
last_updated.description: Holds the date and time when this entry was last updated.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Provides information about the issuing party for this entry.

role.title: Role of the issuing party
role.description: Contains the role of the issuing party according to section 7 in the CSAF standard.

url.title: URL of the metadata
url.description: Contains the URL of the provider-metadata.json for that entry.

mirrors_t.title: List of mirrors
mirrors_t.description: Contains a list of URLs or mirrors for this issuing party.

items.title: Mirror
items.description: Contains the base URL of the mirror for this issuing party.

category.title: Category of aggregator
category.description: Provides information about the category of aggregator.

contact_details.title: Contact details
contact_details.description: Information on how to contact the aggregator, possibly including details such as web sites, email addresses, phone numbers, and postal mail addresses.
examples: Aggregator can be reached at contact_us@aggregator.example.com, or via our website at https://www.example.com/security/csaf/aggregator/contact.

issuing_authority.title: Issuing authority
issuing_authority.description: Provides information about the authority of the aggregator to release the list, in particular, the party's constituency and responsibilities or other obligations.

name.title: Name of aggregator
name.description: Contains the name of the aggregator.

namespace.title: Namespace of aggregator
namespace.description: Contains a URL which is under control of the aggregator and can be used as a globally unique identifier for that aggregator.

aggregator_version.title: CSAF aggregator version
aggregator_version.description: Gives the version of the CSAF aggregator specification which the document was generated for.

canonical_url.title: Canonical URL
canonical_url.description: Contains the URL for this document.

csaf_providers.title: List of CSAF providers
csaf_providers.description: Contains a list with information from CSAF providers.

items.title: CSAF provider entry
items.description: Contains information from a CSAF provider.

metadata.title: CSAF provider metadata.
metadata.description: Contains the metadata of a single CSAF provider.

mirrors.title: List of mirrors
mirrors.description: Contains a list of URLs or mirrors for this CSAF provider.

csaf_publishers.title: List of CSAF publishers
csaf_publishers.description: Contains a list with information from CSAF publishers.

items.title: CSAF publisher entry
items.description: Contains information from a CSAF publisher.

metadata.title: CSAF publisher metadata.
metadata.description: Contains the metadata of a single CSAF publisher extracted from one of its CSAF documents.

mirrors.title: List of mirrors
mirrors.description: Contains a list of URLs or mirrors for this CSAF publisher.

update_interval.title: Update interval
update_interval.description: Contains information about how often the CSAF publisher is checked for new CSAF documents.

last_updated.title: Last updated
last_updated.description: Holds the date and time when the document was last updated.
